Sekkisei Herbal Esthetic

Brand: Sekkisei

Category: Mask

Ingredients: WATER (AQUA) BUTYLENE GLYCOL GLYCERIN ALCOHOL PPG-10 METHYL GLUCOSE ETHER ASCORBYL GLUCOSIDE HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL STEARATE PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRAETHYLHEXANOATE LIMNANTHES ALBA (MEADOWFOAM) SEED OIL ACORUS CALAMUS ROOT EXTRACT ANGELICA ACUTILOBA ROOT EXTRACT CITRUS JUNOS FRUIT

T CITRUS JUNOS FRUIT EXTRACT COIX LACRYMA-JOBI (JOB'S TEARS) SEED EXTRACT MALVA SYLVESTRIS (MALLOW) EXTRACT MELOTHRIA HETEROPHYLLA EXTRACT PAEONIA SUFFRUTICOSA ROOT EXTRACT PORIA COCOS ROOT EXTRACT PRUNUS PERSICA (PEACH) LEAF EXTRACT URTICA DIOICA (NETTLE) EXTRACT ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER ACRYLATES/STEARETH-20 METHACRYLATE COPOL

0 METHACRYLATE COPOLYMER CELLULOSE GUM CETEARYL ALCOHOL CITRIC ACID DI-C12-15 PARETH-8 PHOSPHATE DIMETHICONE DIPENTAERYTHRITYL HEXAHYDROXYSTEARATE/HEXASTEARATE/HEXAROSINATE DISODIUM EDTA DISODIUM PHOSPHATE PEG-60 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL POLYSORBATE 80 SODIUM HYDROXIDE SODIUM LAURYL SULFATE SORBITAN SESQUIOLEATE TALC TRICETEARETH-4 PHOSPHATE TRIETHA

-4 PHOSPHATE TRIETHANOLAMINE METHYLPARABEN FRAGRANCE (PARFUM) CARAMEL TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
